description:
Denis Stern's music invites listeners on a journey--evoking the spirit of
adventure, discovery, and reflection. Each performance is a dynamic fusion of
cultures, crafted with passion and precision, offering a unique musical
experience that is both evocative and uplifting.
name: Denis Stern

performer.description: Experience the vibrant sounds of world-fusion with Denis Stern, a globe-trotting guitarist whose music reflects decades of travel and collaboration across the Middle East, Spain, Russia, and India. Blending elements of flamenco, jazz, Latin, Gypsy, and Middle Eastern traditions, his compositions are brought to life with energetic Indo-Latin rhythms and a distinctive flair for storytelling through sound.
performer.name: Denis Stern
